Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
footage \footage\ n. (Cinematography) 1. the amount of film that has been shot. [WordNet 1.5]
2. a rate of charging by the linear foot of work done. [WordNet 1.5]
footage n 1: the amount of film that has been shot 2: a rate of charging by the linear foot of work done
